column1: Please describe the scalability, robustness, and redundancy of your infrastructure.
What is your largest client in terms of search volume using the search solution you are proposing?
What was the search volume you handled from Black Friday to Cyber Monday? Please provide a screenshot of your analytics showing the search volume during this period.
What levels of client service do you provide?
What specific job roles do we need to create internally to support/manage the search tool to ensure success?
